price: គឺជាពួកដែលបង្កើតម្ចាស់ផេ្សងដើម្បីគោរពសក្ការៈរួមជា មួយអល់ឡោះ។ ដូចេ្នះ ពួកគេគង់តែនឹងដឹង។
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَجۡعَلُونَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَۚ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yajʿalūna maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara fasawfa yaʿlamūna
